text: Semler is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Borut Semler (born 1985), Slovene footballer *Dean Semler (born 1943), Australian cinematographer *Gustav Adolf Semler (1885–1968), German film actor of the silent era *Johann Salomo Semler (1725–1791), German church historian and Biblical commentator *Ricardo Semler (born 1959), the CEO and majority owner of the Brazilian company of Semco SA ==See also== *Jules Semler-Collery (1902–1988), French composer, conductor and teacher *Semmler
title: Semler
